## ResourceJson.Normalized.ILooseResourceCandidateDecl.mergeMethod property

The merge method to be used when merging the resource into the existing resource. default is 'augment'.

**Signature:**

```typescript
readonly mergeMethod?: ResourceValueMergeMethod;
```
